message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This unique offering is tailored to meet your specific needs and comes with exceptional features designed to enhance your experience. Considering its quality and the benefits it provides, we believe it's worth more than just a monetary value. Our initial offer for this product is $1500000. We understand that every buyer has different perspectives on value, so let's discuss how this product can add value to your life or business and see if we can reach an agreement that satisfies both parties.

I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. I believe it's a great product, but I'm trying to stay within my budget. Can we meet in the middle at $1200000?
